Html:
Hello, I asked this question first in Feb of this year, now I have added some more informations:

I have created a document where several bar chart graphs are generated an I put them into a separate worksheet each graph.
This works fine, but instead of placing the graphs over the worksheets cells I would like to make them a "chart sheet", where only the graph is displayed.

In Excel itsself you can produce this kind of sheet like this:
Select a graph you want to be displayed like mentioned, choose diagram tools -> move graph and select "new sheet".
This way, the graph only is displayd in the sheet.

I tried to load excel files with this kind of sheets into phpexcel, recieving an error while loading:
PHP Notice: Undefined index: rId3 in C:\[...]\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader
So it seems to me this kind of thing is not supported yet.

Can someone tell me if this is possible with PHPExcel and if yes, how?

Thank you very much!

My PHP Version 5.6.0
PHPExcel version: 1.8.0, 2014-03-02
My System: Windows 7
